item.title: Live concerts on The Current
item.description:
89.3 The Current, a Minnesota Public Radio station, is ending the year with a bang and broadcasting four outstanding concerts that took place in Minnesota this year.
Rock the Garden 2010 (Photo licensed under a CC NC-SA-2.0 license by Chuck Olsen via Flickr) Monday, December 27th: Rock The Garden. An annual show hosted by The Current at the Walker Art Center, this yearâ€™s Rock the Garden featured Retribution Gospel Choir, Sharon Jones and the Dap-Kings and MGMT.
